description.narrative:
Diakonia har ett pågående insatsavtal med Sida för perioden 2021 - 2025 (insatsnummer 14311). Som en del av avtalet kan Diakonia söka ett bidrag för egeninsats för projektinsatser som finansieras av EU. Syftet är att uppmuntra svenska CSO:er att i ökad utsträckning söka medel från EU. Sida förlitar sin bedömning på den bedömning som EU-kommissionen genomfört, liksom accepterar de format för rapporter som EU använder. Diakonia har ansökt om finansiering av egeninsats om 1 090 000 SEK för EU-projektet "Zambia EU Election Support for Transparency and Accountability 2021" för perioden 1 januari - 31 december 2021.
Insatsens övergripande mål:
"To contribute towards enhancement of the credibility and acceptance of 2021 general election results in Zambia."
Insatsens specifika mål:
1. "Increased domestic electoral observation and voter’s turnout in 2021 general elections." 2. "Enhanced transparency and accountability in the voting, counting and results management – Parallel Vote Tabulation." 3. "Government takes into account recommendations from election monitoring and observation groups made on the 2021 elections." 4. "Improved capacity of CCMG network members for effective management, coordination, and implementation of its mandate."
Insatsens målgrupp består av valbevakare, politiska partier, lokala medier och fyra partnerorganisationer som arbetar under koalitionen "Christian Churches Monitoring Group Coalition" (CCMG). Organisationerna består av "Zambia Conference of Catholic Bishops" (ZCCB) genom "Caritas Zambia" (medsökande organisation), "Council of Churches in Zambia" (CCZ), "Jesuit Centre for Theological Reflection" (JCTR) och "Evangelical Fellowship of Zambia" (EFZ). Diakonia har det övergripande ansvaret över projektets implementering och koordinering.
Den aktuella insatsen har EU-kommissionens referensnummer FED/2020/420-132. Insatsen har en total budget på 1 100 000 EUR, vilket motsvarar cirka 11 144 930 SEK. Av detta har Diakonia beviljats 1 000 000 EUR från EU-kommissionen och ansöker om 1 090 000 SEK (cirka 10%) från Sida.

Diakonia has applied to Sida for funding of 1 090 000 SEK to carry out the EU-project "Zambia EU Election Support for Transparency and Accountability 2021" during 2021.
The overall objective is:
"To contribute towards enhancement of the credibility and acceptance of 2021 general election results in Zambia."
Specific objectives:
1. "Increased domestic electoral observation and voter’s turnout in 2021 general elections." 2. "Enhanced transparency and accountability in the voting, counting and results management – Parallel Vote Tabulation." 3. "Government takes into account recommendations from election monitoring and observation groups made on the 2021 elections." 4. "Improved capacity of CCMG network members for effective management, coordination, and implementation of its mandate."
This project seeks to enhance the capacity of Zambian civil society actors in holding government accountable in the delivery of the 2021 general elections. The project will mobilize and capacity build election monitors (men, women, and youth) from local civil society organizations, to monitor various electoral processes, mobilize and facilitate dialogue around the 2021 general elections, monitor elections and publicize election information and Parallel Vote Tabulation results.
The key stakeholders are the four faith-based civil society organizations working under the Christian Churches Monitoring Group coalition (CCMG). The CCMG comprises of Zambia Conference of Catholic Bishops (ZCCB) through Caritas Zambia (co-applicant), Council of Churches in Zambia (CCZ), Jesuit Centre for Theological Reflection (JCTR) and Evangelical Fellowship of Zambia (EFZ). Diakonia has the overall responsibility of the implementation and coordination of the project.
The contribution has the EU Commission reference number FED/2020/420-132. The contribution's total budget is 1 100 000 EUR, which corresponds to approximately 11 144 930 SEK. The requested support from Sida is 1 090 000 SEK, which corresponds to 10% of the total budget.

tag.narrative: 16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
